Posts.Content: I had a double mastectomy this past June. My dr. told me that they find cancer. I was at a stage 1 . My oncology said I have a chose to do 4 rounds of chemo (taxotere and cytexan) and a hormone blocker 10 years or just take the hormone blocker for 10 years. Not sure what to do? Have any one out there had to make this same decision?
Posts.Title: Chemo are hormone blocker
